headline: J.D. Vance Thanks Anti-Trump Opponent for Making GOP 'Better' Touting Win
author: Katherine Fung
sentences: On Tuesday, Vance also thanked primary rivals Mike Gibbons, former Ohio GOP chair Jane Timken and former State Treasurer Josh Mandelthe latter who had been the leading candidate before Trump's mid-April endorsement of Vance.

Vance thanked his primary opponent Matt Dolanthe only GOP candidate in the race who unapologetically bashed former President Donald Trumpfor making the Republican Party "better" by running against him.
In a statement acknowledging Vance's primary win, Dolan said that despite their differences, both candidates "share a love for our country" and announced his endorsement of Vance for the Senate race.
Vance called Mandel "a longtime and dedicated public servant from the Marine Corps to the State Treasurer's Office" and referred to Mandel's supporters as "some of the best" in Ohio.
Vance, who earned a coveted endorsement from Trump that five of the other seven GOP candidates were vying for, celebrated his win as the next Republican nominee for U.S. Senate.
He represents a continuation of the same failed policies that undermine prosperity, threaten Ohio workers, and restrain the vitality of American competition with China."
"One of the things I want to say about Matt is he could have ran an ugly campaign, but instead he ran a campaign about issues, about substance," he added.
"He has been a great public servant for this country and I think our party was better for the campaign, that Matt Dolan ran.
"A lot of disagreements with Matt Dolanlet's just be honest," Vance said in his victory speech on Tuesday night.
I hope to earn the support of Josh Mandel and all the other candidates who ran," the venture capitalist said.
"Thank you to those candidates and, especially, thank you to the people who ran those campaigns."
His name will appear on the ballot next to Democrat Tim Ryan's in the November 8 election.

"No state has been hurt more by [President] Joe Biden's agenda than Ohio," Dolan said.
"Some of the best people in the state of Ohio voted for Josh Mandel tonight.
"But Matt Dolan had a very professional, very well-resourced campaign."
"Congressman Tim Ryan votes with Joe Biden 100 percent of the time.
Vance to be our next U.S. senator," Dolan added.
